title: Establishing the relationship between land use land cover, normalized difference vegetation index and land surface temperature: A case of Lower Son River Basin, India
content:
Publication date: Available online 15 December 2023

Source: Geography and Sustainability

Author(s): Ms. Shipra Singh, Dr. Pankaj Kumar, Dr. Rakhi Parijat, Barbaros Gonengcil, Mr. Abhinav Rai
